price: 67. Iyo midhaha geedaha timirta iyo canabyada oo aad ka samaysataan cabbitaan culus16 iyo risiq wanaagsan. Arrinkani waxaa ugu sugan calaamo ciddii garasho leh.
arabic: وَمِن ثَمَرَٰتِ ٱلنَّخِيلِ وَٱلۡأَعۡنَٰبِ تَتَّخِذُونَ مِنۡهُ سَكَرٗا وَرِزۡقًا حَسَنًاۚ إِنَّ فِي ذَٰلِكَ لَأٓيَةٗ لِّقَوۡمٖ يَعۡقِلُونَ
footnotes: 16. Aayaddan waxaa la soo dejiyey ka hor inta aan la xarrimin khamriga. Waxay muujineysaa xaqiiqda in waxyaalaha qaarkood ay ku jiraan dhibaato iyo in sidoo kale lahaan karaan xoogaa wanaag ah.

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: wamin thamarāti al-nakhīli wal-aʿnābi tattakhidhūna min'hu sakaran wariz'qan ḥasanan inna fī dhālika laāyatan liqawmin yaʿqilūna
